name: Holy Warriors
description:
LANGUAGE : ENGLISH\ITALIAN

Holy Warriors is a Tactical Turn Based RPG game. From 1 to 10 players on same PC. Features :

- From 1 to 10 players on same PC

- Unique armors (every armor has 4 unique skills)

- A lot of game modes (hunt, run, treasure search....)

- Tournaments and PVP

- Solo quest and team quest

- Dynamic events during combat and dynamic stage building (stage changes every time you start the quest)

- Full interaction with objects (a tree can protect you from attacks coming from the sky, for example...)

and much more.....
